Detailed Description

MPEG2 DRM encryptor with IPMPX signalling.

Encryptor class that adds DRM information to MPEG2 stream, and encrypts stream data.

Definition at line 31 of file IMPEG2IPMPXDRMEncryptor.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::IMPEG2IPMPXDRMEncryptor::EncryptData (  const ByteSeq &  plainData,
ByteSeq &  encryptedData
)  [pure virtual]
 

Encrypt data.

User of IMPEG2IPMPXDRMEncryptor must decide which data will be encrypted (all elementary streams, only some, etc.), and once the IMPEG2IPMPXDRMEncryptor is created, call this function subsequently to encrypt that data.

Parameters:
plainData input, plaintext data to be encrypted.
encryptedData output, encrypted data.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.

Implemented in DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::AES128CTROpenIPMPMPEG2IPMPXDRMEncryptor, and DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::BlowfishOpenIPMPMPEG2IPMPXDRMEncryptor.

Referenced by DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXPStreamEncoder::Encode(), and DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXTStreamEncoder::Encode().

virtual bool DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::IMPEG2IPMPXDRMEncryptor::AddDRMInfo (  IIPMPDescriptor *  descriptor  )  [pure virtual]
 

Add DRM information to IPMP descriptor.

User of IMPEGIPMPX2DRMEncryptor must take care of the correct placement of the IPMP descriptor. If all elementary streams are protected then the IPMP descriptor must be put in the in the main program map loop. If only some elementary streams are protected then the IPMP descriptor must be put in the program map in the elementary stream loop for the protected streams.

Parameters:
descriptor input-output, IPMP descriptor to be updated.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.

Implemented in DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::AES128CTROpenIPMPMPEG2IPMPXDRMEncryptor, and DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::BlowfishOpenIPMPMPEG2IPMPXDRMEncryptor.

Referenced by DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXPStreamEncoder::Encode(), and DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXTStreamEncoder::Encode().
